CREATE DATABASE ps2database

-- create master key that will protect the credentials:
-- run on ps2database
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'helloworld2022!'

CREATE CREDENTIAL cosmoseastusbpsas
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'G6QOPNsMOqK7VbRI8hYsKmV4OTTPt3zHEqz98ZVdbIghNl0BKUqxNFrZzPnOhOkTHZRUxFeKm8ARSRCYAJwKnQ==';

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL WorkspaceIdentity2
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'


SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmoseastusbp;Database=database01',
                OBJECT = 'nyctaxi',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmoseastusbpkey'
) AS [nyctaxi]

DECLARE @var VARCHAR(20) = 'nyctaxi'

DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(500) = 'SELECT TOP 100 * FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB', CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmoseastusbp;Database=database01', OBJECT = ' + CHAR(39) + @var + CHAR(39) + ', SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmoseastusbpsas') AS [nyctaxi]'

EXEC(@SQL)

DECLARE @MYVAR VARCHAR(20) = 'nyctaxi'
PRINT(@MYVAR)
DECLARE @SQL VARCHAR(500) = 'SELECT TOP 100 * FROM OPENROWSET (​PROVIDER = ' + CHAR(39) + 'CosmosDB' + CHAR(39) + ', CONNECTION = ' + CHAR(39) + 'Account=cosmoseastusbp;Database=database01' + CHAR(39) + ', OBJECT = ' + CHAR(39) + @MYVAR + CHAR(39) + ', SERVER_CREDENTIAL = ' + CHAR(39) + 'cosmoseastusbpsas' + CHAR(39) + ') AS [nyctaxi]'
PRINT(@SQL)
EXEC(@SQL)

print(@varoject)

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(​PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=cosmoseastusbp;Database=database01',
                OBJECT = 'nyctaxi',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'cosmoseastusbpsas'
) AS [nyctaxi]
